original_title: Brett Kissel Live at the Drive-In
overview: After the pandemic forced the cancellation of events worldwide, Brett Kissel set out to bring live music back to Canada. In this documentary, Kissel shows how the drive-in concept became a realityâ€”from video calls to socially-distanced rehearsal to finally being back on a stage, separated from his band with plexiglass. 8 sold out shows over 2 days, this was the beginning of the return of live music in Canada. This is the story about how music brought everyone together.
title: Brett Kissel Live at the Drive-In
